name: Habano Lancero Quijote
additionalNotes:
Tony Alvarez Habano Lancero cigars are big and handmade. They're aged and have a smooth medium-bodied taste that makes them true winners. Tony's Lancero Habano cigars have a 38-ring gauge and are creamy with well-balanced and complex earthy notes of coffee, cedar, toast, and raw cocoa. The wrapper is an exquisite Cuban-seed Habano sun-grown leaf from Nicaragua. The binder and aged long-fillers are Cuban-seed Habano from Nicaragua. It's a Puro made for smokers who appreciate the complexity of an all-Nicaragua Habano cigar.
https://cccrafter.com/tony-alvarez-habano-lancero-quijote-7-x-38-cigars/
